name: Love Sucks
description:
Are you mad about being alone on Valentine's Day?  Are you angry you don't have a significant other when it seems like everyone else does? Well what better way to get rid of that anger than to take out your aggression on all the other lovers around you! Destroy the entire Valentines Day Festival finally feel better about being alone!

Controls: WASD to move, SHIFT to run, SPACE to jump, LEFT CLICK to pick things up than RIGHT CLICK to throw them, R to ram, CTRL to ground pound or slam, and ESCAPE to pause.

If you see any bugs or just have suggestions on how to improve the game, let me know in the comments below. I really want to improve as a game developer and any feedback helps!
